Text.Page:
Page 4

The queen asked me to represent the kingdom at a war congress in {@Rgn:63001}. Delegates representing many races attended to discuss their concerns about an invasion so near the amani capitol.

Seven races sent delegates to the human capitol to discuss a course of action. Commander Fraya represented the elves, while General Kaidun, who came with her from Allemantheia, spoke for the amani.Close the book.
